```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns = ['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    print_head = print(df.head())
    describe_results = df.describe()
    final_list = [print_head, describe_results]
    return final_list

preview_data(data)
```
